content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We love not only working but also having fun together.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We believe that this is the best way to learn about each otherâ€™s likes and dislikes and develop unspoken habits and that helps to develop mutual understanding. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":138086,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/cb4b259b-78f6-4cda-90e1-d72e4e694893/epic3.JPG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/cb4b259b-78f6-4cda-90e1-d72e4e694893/epic3.JPG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"epic3.JPG\",\"name\":\"epic3.JPG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"cb4b259b-78f6-4cda-90e1-d72e4e694893\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":737,\"height\":732},\"extension\":\"JPG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
